data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to compare the effects of glycemic exposure observed in DCCT volunteers of the standard versus experimental group on the development and/or progression of diabetic retinopathy. The retinal health status (e.g. presence/absence of macular edema, microaneurysms, neovascularization) was monitored through seven-field stereoscopic fundus photographs which were taken bi-annually and graded using the ETDRS scale (for published results see: <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/7622004?ordinalpos=2&itool=EntrezSystem2.PEntrez.Pubmed.Pubmed_ResultsPanel.Pubmed_DefaultReportPanel.Pubmed_RVDocSum"> PMID 7622004</a>).

variable.name: ETDPAT00
variable.description: Grade on ETDRS scale (patient) - baseline
variable.value: 53/53/12 to 23 equal to 61/LESS THAN 61 OR GREATER

variable.name: MARRIED
variable.description: Patient's marital status

variable.name: FEMALE
variable.description: Patient is female

variable.name: ADULT
variable.description: Patient is adult >=18 years

variable.name: PHASE3
variable.description: Phase of randomization (0=2,1=3; 2=Feasibility, 3=Full-Scale)

variable.name: NEUR0FLG
variable.description: Clinical neuropathy at baseline

variable.name: SMOKER
variable.description: Smoking status at baseline

variable.name: FAMIDDM
variable.description: Family history of IDDM

variable.name: RET20FLG
variable.description: Baseline ETDRS 20/20

variable.name: RET35FLG
variable.description: Baseline ETDRS 35/<=35

variable.name: RET43FLG
variable.description: Baseline ETDRS 43/<43 +

variable.name: PRIMARY
variable.description: Patient belongs to primary (prevention)/secondary (intervention) baseline retinopathy stratum

variable.name: NEUR5FLG
variable.description: Clinical neuropathy observed at year 5

variable.name: NEUR5VIS
variable.description: Actual quarterly visit of neuropathy score at year 5

variable.name: ETD3OFLG
variable.description: 3-step change (ETDRS) from baseline

variable.name: ETD3OVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit of 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: ETD3PFLG
variable.description: Persistent 3-step change (ETDRS) from baseline

variable.name: ETD3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit of persistent 3-step change (ETDRS)

variable.name: L6E3OFLG
variable.description: Late (18 months +) 3-step change from baseline

variable.name: L6E3OVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit of late (18 months +) 3-step change

variable.name: L6E3PFLG
variable.description: Late (18 months +) persistent 3-step change from baseline

variable.name: L6E3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit of late (18 months +) persistent 3-step change

variable.name: ETD53FLG
variable.description: Severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy (npdr) (ETDRS 53/<53)

variable.name: ETD53VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit of severe nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy (ETDRS 53/<53)

variable.name: NEPH2FLG
variable.description: First occurrence of nephropathy level 2

variable.name: NEPH2VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit of first occurrence of nephropathy level 2

variable.name: NEPH5FLG
variable.description: First occurrence of nephropathy level 5 (0=no,1=yes)

variable.name: NEPH5VIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit of first occurrence of nephropathy level 5

variable.name: GROUP
variable.description: Treatment group (experimental, standard)

variable.name: RETBASE
variable.description: Baseline retinopathy stratum

variable.name: DURATION
variable.description: IDDM duration at baseline (months)

variable.name: HBAEL
variable.description: Hb1Ac at eligibility

variable.name: MA3PFLG
variable.description: Persistent (>=3) microaneurysm(s)

variable.name: MA3PVIS
variable.description: Quarterly visit of first observation of persistent (>=3) microaneurysms

variable.name: AER00
variable.description: Albumin excretion rate (mg/24hr) at baseline

variable.name: LAER00
variable.description: Log of baseline AER

variable.name: HBAQV00
variable.description: Baseline HbA1c

variable.name: AGE
variable.description: Patient's age (from master form) at entry

variable.name: BMI
variable.description: Body mass index (kg/m²)

variable.name: MBP
variable.description: Mean arterial blood pressure

variable.name: INSULIN
variable.description: Total insulin dosage units/weight (kg)

variable.name: FULLIQ
variable.description: Full scale I.Q. score

variable.name: EDUCAT
variable.description: Mean education (years) - form 013

variable.name: CALORIES
variable.description: Calories consumed (kcal)

variable.name: PROTEIN
variable.description: Dietary protein (gm)

variable.name: BCVAL5
variable.description: Stimulated C-peptide values (pmol/ml, form 023a)

variable.name: TRG
variable.description: Triglycerides (serum, mg/dl, form 023c)

variable.name: HDL
variable.description: HDL cholesterol (serum, mg/dl, form 023c)

variable.name: LDL
variable.description: LDL cholesterol (serum, mg/dl, form 023c)

variable.name: WPMEAN
variable.description: Within-profile mean blood glucose values (mg/dl)

variable.name: LASTQV
variable.description: Last visit (quarter either for HbA1c, ETDRS or AER measurements)

variable.name: MHBALV
variable.description: Mean HbA1c up to last visit

variable.name: LDUR
variable.description: Log of IDDM duration at baseline (years)

variable.name: LHBAEL
variable.description: Log of HbA1c at eligibility

variable.name: LRET00
variable.description: Log of baseline ETDRS score

variable.name: LRET02
variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 02 ( 6 months)

variable.name: LRET04
variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 04 ( 12 months)

variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 06 ( 18 months)

variable.name: LRET08
variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 08 ( 24 months)

variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 10 ( 30 months)

variable.name: LRET12
variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 12 ( 36 months)

variable.name: LRET14
variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 14 ( 42 months)

variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 16 ( 48 months)

variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 18 ( 54 months)

variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 20 ( 60 months)

variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 22 ( 66 months)

variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 30 ( 90 months)

variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 32 ( 96 months)

variable.name: LRET34
variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 34 (102 months)

variable.name: LRET36
variable.description: Log of ETDRS score at quarterly visit 36 (108 months)

variable.name: LRETSLOP
variable.description: Slope of log of ETDRS score

variable.name: LAER04
variable.description: Log of AER at quarterly visit 04 (1 year )

variable.name: LAER08
variable.description: Log of AER at quarterly visit 08 (2 years)

variable.name: LAER12
variable.description: Log of AER at quarterly visit 12 (3 years)

variable.description: Log of AER at quarterly visit 16 (4 years)

variable.description: Log of AER at quarterly visit 20 (5 years)

variable.description: Log of AER at quarterly visit 24 (6 years)

variable.name: LAER28
variable.description: Log of AER at quarterly visit 28 (7 years)

variable.description: Log of AER at quarterly visit 32 (8 years)

variable.name: LAER36
variable.description: Log of AER at quarterly visit 36 (9 years)

variable.name: LAERSLOP
variable.description: Slope of log of annual AER

variable.name: MNCV00
variable.description: Baseline median motor nerve velocity

variable.name: MNCV20
variable.description: 5-year change: median motor nerve velocity

variable.name: HYPO2FLG
variable.description: Second hypoglycemia with coma/seizure

variable.name: HYPO2YRS
variable.description: Years between first and second hypoglycemic event with coma or seizure

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Patient ID number
